title.content-text: 8.2.2 Denial of Service and Brute Force Attacks

brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Activity
This activity is purposely inaccessible. The activity asks the student to attempt to establish a TCP connection to the web server during a Denial of Service attack. The activity requires you to start the D o S Attack by pressing the Start button and then quickly pressing the PC's located on the Inside network to try to establish a connection. The attempts are futile. The end result is a box that says, "Frustrating, isn't it? Now you can understand the effectiveness of the D o S Attack."
